Html:
Hi, in the documentation under working with templates, it says "It is not possible to add new PHPWord elements to a loaded template file." Would images and/or Excel tables be classed as 'PHPWord elements' in this case or is it possible to create a Word template and us PHPWord to generate a number of documents each with the same basic layout but with a different image and/or table inported via URL.

Many thanks
Lewis
